body: *  This is just a jumping off point I like to have automatically created!
*  Uncomment the functionality you desire or remove the rest.
*  For more information see the Documentation: https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/AutoHotkey.html
; #KeyHistory, 0 ; To disable key history, specify the following line anywhere in the script.
; #NoTrayIcon ; Disables the showing of a tray icon.
#SingleInstance, Force ; Determines whether a script is allowed to run again when it is already running.
; DetectHiddenWindows, On ; Determines whether invisible windows are "seen" by the script.
ListLines, Off ; Displays the script lines most recently executed.
SendMode Input ; Forces Send and SendRaw to use SendInput buffering for speed.
; SetBatchLines, -1 ; 10ms default || -1 to never sleep (i.e. maximum speed).
; SetKeyDelay, -1, -1 ; Remove short delay done automatically after every keystroke sent by Send or ControlSend
; SetMouseDelay, -1 ; Remove short delay done automatically after Click and MouseMove/Click/Drag
SetTitleMatchMode, 3 ; A window's title must exactly match WinTitle to be a match.
; SetWinDelay, -1 ; Remove short delay done automatically after every windowing command except IfWinActive and IfWinExist
SetWorkingDir, % A_ScriptDir ; Changes the script's current working directory.
SplitPath, A_ScriptName,,,, A_AppName ; Get the current script name without it's extension.
template: AutoHotkey script.description: Quickly create a new AutoHotkey script from this template. Contains a few toggle-able optimization features!
